title: Korean War Quiz
description: Often called the 'Forgotten War,' the Korean conflict shaped the Cold War era. How much do you remember?

questions.question: In what year did the Korean War begin?
What parallel divided North and South Korea?
Which general commanded UN forces in Korea and was later fired by President Truman?
Why did President Truman relieve General MacArthur of his command?
options: He publicly disagreed with Truman's limited war policy

questions.question: What was the brilliant amphibious landing behind enemy lines that turned the tide of the war?
Which country entered the Korean War on the side of North Korea in late 1950?
What was the famous battle where U.S. Marines fought their way out of a Chinese encirclement in brutal cold?
options: The Battle of the Chosin Reservoir
The Battle of Pork Chop Hill

questions.question: In what year was the armistice signed that ended active fighting?
What popular TV show, running from 1972-1983, was set during the Korean War?
Approximately how many American service members died in the Korean War?
What nickname was given to the Korean War because it received less public attention than WWII or Vietnam?
Which U.S. President was elected partly on a promise to end the Korean War?
What was the defensive perimeter that UN forces held in the southeast corner of Korea in 1950?
